item.text: Or do you not know, brothers and sisters (for I am speaking to those who know the law), that the law is lord over a person as long as he lives?

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> a <st data-num="5220" class="">married</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> is <st data-num="1210" class="">bound</st> by <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> to her <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st> as long as he <st data-num="2198" class="">lives</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> her<n id="1" /> <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st> <st data-num="599" class="">dies</st>, she is <st data-num="2673" class="">released</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of the <st data-num="435">marriage</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="686">So</st> <st data-num="3767">then</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> she is <st data-num="1096" class="">joined</st> to <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> while her <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st> is <st data-num="2198" class="">alive</st>, she will be <st data-num="5537" class="">called</st> an <st data-num="3428" class="">adulteress</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> her<n id="2" /> <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st> <st data-num="599" class="">dies</st>, she <st data-num="1510">is</st> <st data-num="1658" class="">free</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> that <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, and if she is <st data-num="1096" class="">joined</st> to <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="846">she</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> an <st data-num="3428" class="">adulteress</st>.

<st data-num="5620" class="">So</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2289" class="">died</st> to the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="1519">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> could be <st data-num="1096" class="">joined</st> to <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st>, to the one who was <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2592">bear fruit</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3804" class="">sinful</st> <st data-num="266" class="">desires</st>,<n id="2" /> aroused <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, were <st data-num="1754" class="">active</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> body<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2592">bear fruit</st> for <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>.
But now we have been released from the law, because we have died to what controlled us, so that we may serve in the new life of the Spirit and not under the old written code.

What shall we say then? Is the law sin? Absolutely not! Certainly, I would not have known sin except through the law. For indeed I would not have known what it means to desire something belonging to someone else if the law had not said, “Do not covet.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>, <st data-num="2983" class="">seizing</st> the <st data-num="874" class="">opportunity</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st>, <st data-num="2716" class="">produced</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3956">all kinds</st> of wrong <st data-num="1939" class="">desires</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5565">apart from</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> is <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> was <st data-num="4218" class="">once</st> <st data-num="2198">alive</st> <st data-num="5565">apart from</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> with the <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> of the <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st>, <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> became <st data-num="326" class="">alive</st>

<st data-num="1161">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="599">died</st>. <st data-num="2532">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> that the <st data-num="3778">very</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st> that was intended to <st data-num="1519" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>!<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>, <st data-num="2983" class="">seizing</st> the <st data-num="874" class="">opportunity</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st>, <st data-num="1818" class="">deceived</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> I <st data-num="615" class="">died</st>.<n id="1" />
So then, the law is holy, and the commandment is holy, righteous, and good.

Did that which is good, then, become death to me? Absolutely not! But sin, so that it would be shown to be sin, produced death in me through what is good, so that through the commandment sin would become utterly sinful.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual</st>—<st data-num="1161">but</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="4560" class="">unspiritual</st>, <st data-num="4097">sold into slavery</st> <st data-num="5259">to</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="3756" class="">don’t</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I am <st data-num="2716" class="">doing</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4238">do</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st>—<st data-num="235" class="">instead</st>, I <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I <st data-num="3404" class="">hate</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> I <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st>, I <st data-num="4852" class="">agree</st> <st data-num="3754">that</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> is <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3570" class="">now</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> is <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2716" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> that <st data-num="3611">lives</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="3611" class="">lives</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to do the <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st>, <st data-num="1161">but</st> I <st data-num="3756" class="">cannot</st> <st data-num="2716" class="">do</st> it.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="4160">do</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> do the <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> I <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> I <st data-num="4238">do</st> the <st data-num="3778">very</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st>!
Now if I do what I do not want, it is no longer me doing it but sin that lives in me.

<st data-num="686" class="">So</st>, I <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> that when <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st>, <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st> is <st data-num="3873" class="">present</st> with <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="4913" class="">delight</st> in the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2596">in</st> my <st data-num="2080" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="444" class="">being</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> a <st data-num="2087" class="">different</st> <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> <st data-num="497">waging war against</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3563" class="">mind</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="163" class="">making</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="163" class="">captive</st> to the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> that <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st>.

<st data-num="5005" class="">Wretched</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> that <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am! <st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> will <st data-num="4506" class="">rescue</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> of <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>?
Thanks be to God through Jesus Christ our Lord! So then, I myself serve the law of God with my mind, but with my flesh I serve the law of sin.
